mapper.select: SELECT a.`store_id`, a.`member_id`, a.`phone`, a.`name`, a.`sex`, a.`status`, a.`line`, a.`remark`, ap.`project_id` AS ap_project_id, ap.`employee_id` AS ap_employee_id, ap.`begin_time` AS ap_begin_time, ap.`end_time` AS ap_end_time FROM appointment a LEFT JOIN appointment_project ap ON a.id = ap.appointment_id WHERE a.`status` IN (1,2) AND ap.employee_id = #{employeeId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY ap.begin_time ORDER BY ap.begin_time
